tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vital_signs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  heart_rate INT,
  blood_pressure VARCHAR,
  temperature FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE vital_signs_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    heart_rate INT,
    blood_pressure VARCHAR(50),
    temperature DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE patient_info (
    patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(100),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE vital_signs_data ( 
    measurement_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    patient_id INT NOT NULL, 
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, 
    heart_rate INT, 
    blood_pressure VARCHAR, 
    temperature FLOAT 
);

CREATE TABLE vital_signs_data (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  heart_rate INTEGER,
  blood_pressure VARCHAR,
  temperature FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE VitalSignsData (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    patient_id UUID,
    heart_rate INT,
    blood_pressure VARCHAR,
    temperature FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR,
    last_name VARCHAR,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE BloodPressureHistory (
    history_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    patient_id UUID,
    systolic_pressure INT,
    diastolic_pressure INT
);
